entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 12:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then flurries beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
